conbody.p: Good Morning! I hope you slept well and are ready to take on another day. If not, dont worry, that's what I'm here for! You'll be able to find all the ingredients and supplies required for the food in this cookbook in the drawers and cupboards of the kitchen. If you can't, just holler and I'll come help! Happy cooking!
conbody.note: Don't worry if your products aren't as "artsy" as the pictures shown, just have fun and remember to clean up!
